service_name: OCSL Infrastructure as a Service IaaS Storage
page_content:
OCSL MANAGED SERVICES LIMITED

OCSL Infrastructure as a Service IaaS Storage

Infrastructure as a Service Storage from OCSL provides readily available, managed and scalable storage up to OFFICIAL classification. Housed in our own Tier 3 UK datacentres connecting over the internet or N3. It is an efficient, highly secure, flexible and is a complimentary storage solution to our compute service.

Features

  • Multi location storage options
  • UK Sovereign, UK Domained, Data never leaves the UK
  • Connect over the internet or N3
  • Up to 99.99% availability
  • Dedicated circuits, Leased Lines, MPLS, with automatic failover
  • Control over secure storage
  • Increase capacity when required- easy scalability
  • Built on enterprise storage technology

Benefits

  • High performance, enterprise throughput and reliability for latency-sensitive data
  • Utility billing model - pay for what you use
  • Enable remote working easily accessible
  • Leverage our 10 year skill set and experience
  • Improve availability & user satisfaction
  • Control and monitor who can access your data
  • VMware Private Cloud
  • Hyper-V Private Cloud
  • OpenStack Private Cloud

Pricing

£34.61 per terabyte per month

  • Excluding VAT
  • Education pricing available
  • Minimum contract period: Month
  • Trial and free options available
